DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of Gemfibrozil on the Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of a Single Dose of AZD1656
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate the Effect of Gemfibrozil on the Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of a Single Dose of AZD1656
DOC.criteria: Patients with confirmed Type 2 diabetes mellitus for at least 1 year and treated with metformin. Body mass index between ≥19 and ≤42 kg/m2. Intake of another investigational drug within the last 30 days prior to enrolment. Clinically significant illness or clinically relevant trauma.
